title: GRID: Times of Crisis - John Berger and Noam Chomsky (4/22/14)
description: Exclusive material from writer, artist, critic John Berger and a virtual response and conversation with Noam Chomsky, Professor Emeritus of Linguistics and Philosophy at MIT.  This event took place at Dartmouth College as part of GRID's 2014 Spring Public Lecture Series: Times of Crisis
